alert.note: Alert for Cobb; Douglas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 31 at 8:20PM EST until January 01 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek near Austell affecting Douglas and Cobb Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek near Austell. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10 feet, minor flooding occurs in the woodlands and fields upstream and downstream from the gage near the Interstate 20 bridge. Portions of the paintball playing field just downstream of the bridge begin to flood and the athletic fields in the Woodrow Wilson Park on Mount Vernon Road begin to flood due to water backing up in ditches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.5 feet and nearly steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain around 10.5 feet until just after midnight tonight. It will fall below flood stage late Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
